title: Swap $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: Replace f(x) with $$y$$ and swap $$x$$ and $$y$$ in the equation.

title: Isolate the squared term
text: Solve for (y + 1)**2 in terms of $$x$$ by adding $$3$$ to both sides.

title: Take the square root and solve for $$y$$
text: Remember to apply the square root to both sides, considering the given domain, and solve for $$y$$.
